properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Even as He (Even as He) Even as He (Even as He) Wonderful words that even we Saved by His marvelous grace may be One with the Savior Even as He{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh what a wonderful place Jesus has given to me Saved by His glorious grace I may be even as He When with my Lord I appear Like Him I know I shall be But while I walk with Him here I may be even as He{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One in His death on the tree One as He rose from the dead I from the curse am as free E'en as my glorious Head One on the throne by His side One in His sonship divine One as the Bride-groom and bride One as the branch and the Vine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One in His merits I stand One as I pray in His name All that His worth can command I can with confidence claim One in His faith and His love One in His life I may be Sealed by the heavenly Dove I may be holy as He{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One in the rapturous hour When He shall come for His own Raised by His glorious power I shall sit down on His throne All that He has shall be mine All that He is I shall be Robed in His glory divine I shall be even as He{/lang-eng}
